bio.singa.mathematics.graphs.model

Class AbstractMapGraph<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,VectorType,IdentifierType>,EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,VectorType extends Vector,IdentifierType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.mathematics.graphs.model.AbstractMapGraph<NodeType,EdgeType,VectorType,IdentifierType>
  • Type Parameters:
    NodeType - The type of the nodes in the graph.
    EdgeType - The type of the edges in the graph.
    VectorType - The vector that is used to define the position of this node.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph<NodeType,EdgeType,IdentifierType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectedGraph, DirectedWeightedGraph, GenericGraph, MoleculeGraph, UndirectedGraph

    public abstract class AbstractMapGraph<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,VectorType,IdentifierType>,EdgeType extends Edge<NodeType>,VectorType extends Vector,IdentifierType>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph<NodeType,EdgeType,IdentifierType>
    This is a simple implementation of the graph interface, that handles the most common operations defined for adding and removing edges as well as nodes. Nodes and edge are referenced in a HashMap with integer keys and can therefor quickly be retrieved and inserted.
